notes.content: Completed: Verified beads system functionality works
notes.author: ted

bead.title: Improve error handling consistency
bead.description: Many modules use panic!() and unwrap() extensively. Replace with proper error propagation using Result types, especially in core modules like agents, context, and LLM providers.

bead.title: Refactor large modules into smaller components
bead.description: Break down large modules like src/context/mod.rs (1000+ lines), src/chat/session.rs, and src/indexer/mod.rs into smaller, focused modules with clear responsibilities.

bead.title: Improve test coverage across core modules
bead.description: Add comprehensive unit tests for core functionality. Current test coverage appears minimal. Focus on testing agents, context management, embeddings, and LLM providers.

bead.title: Address performance bottlenecks
bead.description: Optimize performance bottlenecks including: vector search operations, file system operations in context management, memory usage in embeddings, and string allocations in parsing.

bead.title: Improve documentation coverage
bead.description: Add comprehensive API documentation for public interfaces and architectural documentation explaining the relationship between major components (agents, context, tools, etc.).

bead.title: Strengthen input validation and security
bead.description: Review and improve input validation, especially in MCP protocol handling, tool execution, and file operations. Add proper sanitization for user inputs.

bead.title: Create comprehensive architecture documentation
bead.description:
Create AGENTS.md and update/create architectural documentation to better capture:
- Agent system design and philosophy
- How major components (agents, context, tools, caps) interact
- Development philosophy and design principles
- Technical decision rationale
- Onboarding guide for new contributors

bead.title: Improve error handling consistency
bead.description: Many modules use panic!() and unwrap() extensively. Replace with proper error propagation using Result types, especially in core modules like agents, context, and LLM providers.

bead.title: Improve test coverage across core modules
bead.description: Add comprehensive unit tests for core functionality. Current test coverage appears minimal. Focus on testing agents, context management, embeddings, and LLM providers.

bead.title: Strengthen input validation and security
bead.description: Review and improve input validation, especially in MCP protocol handling, tool execution, and file operations. Add proper sanitization for user inputs.
